argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | idresperm.g | |- G = ( SymGrp ` A ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_symgid | |- ( A e. V -> ( _I |` A ) = ( 0g ` G ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_sneqd | |- ( A e. V -> { ( _I |` A ) } = { ( 0g ` G ) } ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_symggrp | |- ( A e. V -> G e. Grp ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 0g ` G ) = ( 0g ` G ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_0subg | |- ( G e. Grp -> { ( 0g ` G ) } e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 7 | 4, 6 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. V -> { ( 0g ` G ) } e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
| 8 | 3, 7 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( A e. V -> { ( _I |` A ) } e. ( SubGrp ` G ) ) |
